description:
Priced for entry-level appeal, but with features that are high-end all the way. The overlapping double-tunnel and nylon webbing belt adjustments provide a reliably dry seal, and the overall cut is designed for mobility and paddling comfort.

  • Made with waterproof-breathable 2.5-ply eXhaust fabric with fully taped seams
  • Gaskets at neck and wrists are latex with 0.5mm neoprene protectors
  • Double-tunnel and Stealth waistband works with your skirt tunnel
  • Hidden key pocket
name: Level Six Duke Dry Top - Men's
